response.original_title: 機動戦士ガンダム 閃光のハサウェイ
response.overview: 12 years after Char's rebellion, Hathaway Noa leads an insurgency against Earth Federation, but meeting an enemy officer and a mysterious woman alters his fate.
response.tagline: Char's ideals and Amuro's passion... the heir of their wills...
response.title: Mobile Suit Gundam Hathaway
